item.Q:
Write the character:
1: heavy; serious
2: to double; to repeat; repetition; iteration; again; a layer
item.A:
1: zhòng 2: chóng
重要 zhòngyào important; significant; major 重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to; for; for the benefit of; to give; to allow; to do sth (for sb); (passive particle)
2: to supply; provide
item.A:
给 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 給
1: gěi 2: jǐ
供给 (供給) gōnggěi supply 供给 (供給) gōngjǐ to furnish; to provide; supply (as in supply and demand)

traditional: 聽
tīng
听说 (聽說) tīngshuō to hear told

shuǐ
水分 shuǐfèn moisture content

zuò
叫做 jiàozuò be called; be known as

item.Q:
Write the character:
always; ever; often; frequently; common; general; constant; surname
item.A:
cháng
经常 (經常) jīngcháng day to day; everyday; daily; frequently; constantly; regularly; often
nín

item.Q:
Write the character:
to see; to meet; to appear (to be sth); to interview
item.A:
traditional: 見
jiàn
意见 (意見) yìjiàn idea; opinion; suggestion; objection; complaint

item.Q:
Write the character:
village; within; inside; internal; interior
item.A:
traditional: 裡
lǐ
里面 (裡面) lǐmiàn inside; interior

traditional: 東
dōng
东西 (東西) dōngxi thing; person

item.Q:
Write the character:
wind; news; style; custom; manner
item.A:
traditional: 風
fēng
作风 (作風) zuòfēng style; style of work; way

item.Q:
Write the character:
to divide; to break up; to split; to separate; to dissolve; to solve; to melt; to remove; to untie; to loosen; to open; to emancipate; to explain; to understand; to know; a solution; a dissection
item.A:
解 (strokes unavailable)
jiě
解决 (解決) jiějué to settle (a dispute); to resolve; to solve

湾 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 灣
wān
台湾 (台灣) Táiwān Taiwan

yuè
十二月 shíèryuè December; twelfth month

item.Q:
Write the character:
class; rank; grade; equal to; same as; wait for; await; et cetera; and so on; et al. (and other authors); after; as soon as; once
item.A:
děng
相等 xiāngděng equal; equally; equivalent

lā
哗啦 (嘩啦) huālā sound of a crash

item.Q:
Write the character:
ministry; department; section; part; division; troops; board; (classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc)
item.A:
bù
部分 bùfen part

item.Q:
Write the character:
former; original; primary; raw; level; cause; source
item.A:
yuán
原则 (原則) yuánzé principle; doctrine

měi
美国 (美國) Měiguó America; American; United States of America; USA

early; prior; former; in advance; first
item.A:
xiān
首先 shǒuxiān first (of all); in the first place

item.Q:
Write the character: xiān
(shǒuxiān de xiān)
item.A:
early; prior; former; in advance; first
首先 shǒuxiān first (of all); in the first place

bùfen part
bùfèn part; share; section; piece
zhòngyào important; significant; major

traditional: 美國
Měiguó America; American; United States of America; USA
quánbù whole; entire; complete
yuányīn cause; origin; root cause; reason

traditional: 原來
yuánlái original; former; originally; formerly; at first; so... actually

xiānsheng sir; mister; teacher; (title of respect)
xiānshēng Mr.

traditional: 經常
jīngcháng day to day; everyday; daily; frequently; constantly; regularly; often
yuánzǐ atom; atomic
xiāngděng equal; equally; equivalent

traditional: 意見
yìjiàn idea; opinion; suggestion; objection; complaint
liǎojiě understanding
zhèngcháng regular; normal; ordinary

traditional: 先進
xiānjìn advanced (technology); to advance

traditional: 那裡
nàli there

traditional: 看見
kànjiàn to see; to catch sight of
dàbù most of; the majority of sth
zhòngdà great; important; major; significant
yuánlǐ principle; theory

qiánmian front
qiánmiàn ahead; in front; preceding; above
